title: Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts: Let's Move with Music
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Let's Move with Music              Let's Move with Music at Wolf Trap!         Group participates in a jazzercise activity in the meadow as a part of Let's Move with Music at Wolf Trap. NPS Photo  Let's Move with Music at Wolf Trap! is a fun, free annual event which takes place at Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts in Vienna, Virginia. The program is geared towards children and families with encouragement to be active and promote healthy lifestyle choices.   The activities have an overarching theme of rhythmic music and dance, as well as an infusion of cultural diversity, exciting games, and fitness activities. In addition to live performances, there will also be opportunities to earn a Junior Ranger badge! The day is sure to be loads of fun! Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts will celebrate its 5th annual Let's Move with Music at Wolf Trap! event on Saturday, September 24, 2016 from 10 am to 2 pm. Be sure to tell a friend! We hope to see you there!
